title: This is probably why I won''t get a girlfriend

comments.author: vijay03
comments.content: Machi, you are now ready for marriage :P "No guy wants to date his own feminine self." - Stronga nee etha thaan ethir paakara nu nenaikaren :P And good that you are citing your sources :P Good luck on finding this hypo girl da :P Hopefully when you meet her, she will still be available :P Also, about time you blogged again!

comments.author: Saran Raj
comments.content: Nice to read your blog after a long time!!! Best of "LUCK"... :-)

comments.author: madthanu
comments.content: Someone should tweet Chinmayi about this post...

comments.author: Suji
comments.content: Pradep: After reading half through, you said what I wanted to comment . You can find feminine version of yourself a lot easier than your "real" girl! and Good luck dude finding your mate. BTW did any chance you got the spark by talking to Thanu? Just curious, not damaging thanu :P

comments.author: Jegan
comments.content: well i can give u just one advice.. a quote from borat movie.. "if you chase a dream, especially one with \*\*\*\*\*\*\* \*\*\*\*\*\*, you may miss the real beauty in front of your eyes"

comments.author: Sivaguru
comments.content: Brilliant Machi! Dont worry if she is already taken, Keep trying :P You never had she shouldn't be already committed in your list, right? @Jegan...."If you have a dream, you must protect it" :P. This is a a quote from another movie and I know you absolutely love that movie too.

comments.author: Senthil
comments.content: it was fun. would have been infinitely funny if sri and i read it together! we would have come up with version 2 of this post :P (remaining on chat :P)

comments.author: Kannapiran Thirunarayanan
comments.content: otha... if I know a "girl" like that.. then how the hell do u think I will ever let u contact her without me "correcting" her first... I'd say, get down and "do the dance alone with no pants"... And maybe u can teach IMDB to someone...

comments.author: Ashok Kumar
comments.content: No you are not going to find her, this hypothetical girl. But you will find a girl. A girl much different from your expectations. A girl who can make you smile. Whom you will make laugh. And you two will be a loving couple, and none of this will be the thing that connects you two. It will be beyond all these. And then, you will realize that you just love her. Just plain Love and nothing else.

comments.content: Ready for Marriage a ? Ennada Solra? Citing Sources. I always do that. PhD padikkarthunaala source llellam kuriya irukka polirukku :P And your comment came just few minutes after i published the post. Nanbenda!

comments.content: Monna naaye. Athenna "LUCK". Nakkala. Glad to see you are still reading my posts. :)

comments.content: Ithaan. Ithaan un kitta enakku romba pudicha vishayame. Ellar maariyum pechoda niruthidaama, action la erangara paathiya. Mass da nee. Okay, email me her phone number once you get it. Don't put it out in public. Lots of porukki pasanga around :D

comments.content: @kanna - he mentioned guys like me :( committed, so we are prohibited from dating other 'Dream girls' ! @Ashok - it was a joke. He is not damn serious in looking for a girl. Someone is already waiting for him. @ pradep - machi, girls criteria number 1 : Ajith mathiri, surya mathiri, karthick mathiri color a handsome a irukanum. Yarume, murali mathiri, parthiban mathiri karupa irukanumnu keka matanga. So, kandipa un dream girl una dream la kuda paka mata. I was about to advise, 'Leave the girls pool. Go to a gay bar, u are likely to find a much better partner than u expected' - Nee ushara enaku femine self venamnu potute. Nice post. Original one was very nice, but missed the 'GLAMOUR' touch !
